pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyRCL## Release Notes### v1.0.8* Fixed missing breakpoint actions `WATCH`, `TRACEENABLE`, `TRACEDATA`, `TRACEON`, `TRACEOFF` and `TRACETRIGGER`### v1.0.7* Fixed missing module level export of `hexversion()`### v1.0.6* Fixed missing module level exports of `version` and multiple exceptions* Fixed breakpoint core and size parameters* Added `ConnectionError` as baseclass of `ApiConnectionError`### v1.0.5Various bugfixes### v1.0.4Various bugfixes### v1.0.3Various bugfixes### v1.0.2Various bugfixes### v1.0.1Various bugfixes### v1.0.0Initial release
